advanced-settings.label: Advances Settings
advanced-settings.activate-kit-alert: After selecting this option and saving SKU, will not be possible to undo

advanced-settings.generate-credit-tooltip: It is used to create a kind of Event List, which generates a purchase credit to the owner of the List, with the value of the items purchased. Ex: Wedding List, Baby Shower.
advanced-settings.generate-credit-info:
Select YES only if this sku is intended for use in the List of events of the type that generates credits to gift cards
. Caution: improper use of this field will undermine the normal process of selling this item.
advanced-settings.modal-tooltip: It is used to differentiate skus delivery. Items with Modal set can only be delivered by carriers with the same modal.
advanced-settings.is-stock-availability-tooltip: This SKU has limited availability due to low invetory
advanced-settings.is-fisic-delivery-requires-tooltip: This SKU requires delivery (Eg .: Post, Carrier) and may suffer freight calculation.
advanced-settings.attachments-info:
A Attach is used to add custom information from customer of a service or of the purchased item

Example:.

Item Purchased -> "Official shirt of the Brazilian team "

Attach name -> " Custom "

key 1 -> key Name: " name "Maximum characters allowed: 20
key 2 -> key Name: "Number " allowed values: "5,7,9,10,11 "

This means that an official shirt of the Brazilian Team will have a Attach called "Custom ", mandatory or not, whose keys are the "name " and "Number " to be printed on the shirt purchased as the customer's choice. The customer can enter a name up to 20 characters (you can enter a free name), but will have to choose between numbers 5, 7, 9, 10 and 11 (can not enter the numbers you want).

If you want to register a new Attach not yet existing in the System

sellers.label: Sellers

info.1:
This guide has the functionality of reassociating this SKU to another SKU registered in the system by other seller.

The scenario, for example, is when the SKU is sold by Sellers X and Y, but there was a hint of approval created two Products, one for each Seller, instead of associating the SKU and maintain a Product only.
This case may occur when the approved SKUs have different EANs. It’s desirable to unite the duplicated SKUs in a single Product.

sellers.findSKUtoAssociate: Find SKU you wish to reassociate

product.name: Name
product.sameSemanticWords:
Substitute words (use words that have the same semantics)

Examples:
Electronic -> Electronics;
Refrigerator -> Fridge;
Calvin Klein -> Calvin Klain;

Important: these words will be used in internal searchs and also in Search sites

commercialPolicyForm.name: Name
commercialPolicyForm.nameCondition: Commercial Policy name cannot be initiated by: seq.
commercialPolicyForm.collectionInfo: Obs: It’s required to index products on the chosen collection.
commercialPolicyForm.currencySymbolInfo: If not informed will use the default currency symbol (currency code)
commercialPolicyForm.conditionRuleTooltip: The conditional rule is validated based on the user profile data. It will be granted access to the first Policy whose rule is attended. The rules are validated according to the order defined in the Management. If there is no Commercial Policy with rule met by the user's profile, it will be redirected to the first Commercial Policy with no defined rule, following the ordination. Example rule: gender = "m "
commercialPolicyForm.conditionRuleInfo: <strong> Attention! The default value of this field is blank. Fill out only if necessary. </ Strong> The conditional rule will redirect to the Commercial Policy users whose profile data satisfy the conditional rule specified.
